title: China stocks rise on energy, tech sectors - Financial Post
description: SHANGHAI — China stocks settled higher on Thursday, led by energy shares as crude oil futures jumped on hopes for a deal to end the price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia, and by tech firm…
content:
SHANGHAI — China stocks settled higher on Thursday, led by energy shares as crude oil futures jumped on hopes for a deal to end the price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia, and by tech firms.
** At the close, the Shanghai Composite index was up 1.69% at 2,… [+1720 chars]
